author: mmali@thehill.com (Nathaniel Weixel and Peter Sullivan)
title: 18 things to know today about coronavirus
description: Welcome to The Hill’s daily roundup of coronavirus news. There are now more than 386,000 confirmed cases in the U.S., with over 12,000 deaths reported.Some states seem close to reaching the peak of the coronavirus surge, while others still have...
content:
Welcome to The Hills daily roundup of coronavirus news. 
There are now more than 386,000 confirmed cases in the U.S., with over 12,000 deaths reported.
Some states seem close to reaching the peak of the coronavirus surge, while others still have a way to go… [+5032 chars]
